com.jb.couponsystem.repo

Interface CustomerRepo

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Customer,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Customer,java.lang.Long>

    public interface CustomerRepo
extends org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Customer,java.lang.Long>
    This interface contains query methods that refer to the customer objects in the database.
    Author:
    Alexander Zablotsky

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean existsByCustomerName(java.lang.String customerName)
      This method checks if a customer with a given name exists in the database.
      Customer findByName(java.lang.String customerName)
      This method finds and returns customer object in the database by his/her name received as a parameter from the outside.
      Customer findByNameAndPwd(java.lang.String customerName, java.lang.String password)
      This method finds and returns customer object in the database by his/her name and password received as parameters from the outside.
      java.util.List<Customer> findCustomerByCustomerName(java.lang.String customerName)
      This method finds customers from the database by customer name received as a parameter from the outside and returns them as list of objects.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository

        count, delete, delete, delete, deleteAll, exists, findAll, findAll, findOne, save, save

      • findCustomerByCustomerName

        java.util.List<Customer> findCustomerByCustomerName(java.lang.String customerName)
        This method finds customers from the database by customer name received as a parameter from the outside and returns them as list of objects.
        Parameters:
        customerName - customer name
        Returns:
        list of customers

      • existsByCustomerName

        @Query(value="SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(c) > 0 THEN \'true\' ELSE \'false\' END FROM CUSTOMERS c WHERE c.customerName = :customerName")
boolean existsByCustomerName(@Param(value="customerName")
                                                                                                                                                                   java.lang.String customerName)
        This method checks if a customer with a given name exists in the database. It returns true if it exists, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        customerName - customer name
        Returns:
        true if a customer with a given name exists, false otherwise

        @Query(value="SELECT * FROM CUSTOMERS WHERE CUSTOMER_NAME = :customerName AND PASSWORD = :password",
